instructions: Cook the dried soy strips in the stock along with spices: shawarma spice, salt, white pepper, garlic powder, ras al hanout. (No more than 20 minutes assuming the vegetable stock is boiling when you add the strips).

heat a pan with a little oil, fry the onion, add the strips until they are browned, add shawarma spice, a little cumin and ras al hanout to the pan, and most importantly a little amba at the end of frying.
